channel.title: Homes on Jeremias Knoblauch
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jeremias Knoblauch

item.description: News I am excited to be working with Amazon Cambridge’s Machine Learning Research group 01/08/19-01/12/19 under the supervision of Tom Diethe I am delighted to be collaborating with David Dunson at Duke University from 01/03/19-01/06/19 I am thrilled to be the first UK-based doctoral researcher to have been selected into the Facebook Fellowship programme, see here for a press release by the Alan Turing Institute. About me I am a doctoral researcher working at the nexus of computer science and statistics within the Oxford-Warwick Statistics Programme (OxWaSP) supervised by Theodoros Damoulas.
